review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick was easier to install than I expected and streaming was smoother and sharper than it has been through my wi-fi compatible Sony blue ray player.  My internet service is not the best and that has limited my use of the Fire TV Stick.  Other than that, my only real concern is that I could use a key board rather than the number pad.  The lack of a key board made both setup and content searches more difficult than I would have liked.
author: Andrew Wright

review: I have only used for a week TV stick.  Was easy to get started and stream movies.  My only complaint is I have to put system to sleep or it will keep playing past half hour stated in instructions.  My husband has already become a streaming junkie.  I would recommend to anyone.
